tool_description: Powerful and comprehensive API allows scraping articles from web-pages efficiently, safely, and effortlessly. Removing any unwanted elements like ads or other noise from the article and returning only the cleaned text along with many different meta information.
name: Website Article Data Extraction and Text Mining
title: Website Article Data Extraction and Text Mining
tool_name: Website Article Data Extraction and Text Mining

api_list.name: /v1/scrape
api_list.description: Scrape a given URL for its content.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL you would like to scrape its content from.

optional_parameters.name: device
optional_parameters.description: What device the URL should be accessed by.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country you want the URL requested from and have a proxy set.

optional_parameters.name: include_html
optional_parameters.description: Includes HTML source in the result.
